A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson's addition to the Star Wars film canon felt more like a low-budget\, hastily written\, absolute mess of a fan film. I honestly couldn't tell if I was watching a group of weird pilot episodes for TV shows that would never air... or a YouTube video that was so bad I couldn't look away. The over-use of humor and \"cute factor\"\, weird\, confusing and pointless plot points\, worthless new characters\, and a villain so wasted you'll begin to wonder if you accidentally walked into a screening of the prequels. \nI did not like The Last Jedi. It is the only Star Wars film I have walked away from disappointed. And that really hurts me to say.
